definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]

sentences.english: "Well, it isn't as interesting, " said Hurstwood.
sentences.chinese: “哎，也不如芝加哥有意思，”赫斯渥說。

sentences.english: Hurstwood knew nothing of the change of temper.
sentences.chinese: 赫斯渥對形勢的這些變化一無所知。

sentences.english: By the evening of the 16th the subtle hand of Hurstwood had made itself apparent.
sentences.chinese: 到了16日晚上，赫斯渥已經巧妙地大顯神通。

sentences.english: "Sure, " said Drouet, quite pleased at the attention shown.
sentences.chinese: “行啊，”杜洛埃說，對赫斯渥的好意感到高興。

sentences.english: When Hurstwood called, she met a man who was more clever than Drouet in a hundred ways.
sentences.chinese: 赫斯渥來訪時，她發現他在各方面比杜洛埃聰明。

sentences.english: "Is Mr. Drouet in?" said Hurstwood blandly.
sentences.chinese: “杜洛埃先生在家嗎？”赫斯渥和悅地說。

sentences.english: If Hurstwood had one leaning, it was toward notabilities .
sentences.chinese: 倘若赫斯渥有什麼可傾心的，那就是傾心名流。

sentences.english: This cut Hurstwood like a whip, and made him sullen.
sentences.chinese: 這話像鞭子一樣抽痛了赫斯渥。

sentences.english: "She's making more than she says, " thought Hurstwood.
sentences.chinese: “她掙的錢比她說的要多，”赫斯渥想。“

sentences.english: As he did so, Hurstwood slipped and fell in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 他這麼一推，赫斯渥腳下一滑，跌倒在雪地上。

sentences.english: Drouet fidgeted. Hurstwood moved his toe the least bit.
sentences.chinese: 杜洛埃坐立不安了，赫斯渥卻一點不動聲色。

sentences.english: The latter made progress along Thirteenth and across Fourteenth Street to Union Square.
sentences.chinese: 赫斯渥沿着十三街朝前走，穿過十四街來到聯合廣場。

sentences.english: "When do you leave?" said Hurstwood to Drouet.
sentences.chinese: “你什麼時候出門？”赫斯渥問杜洛埃。
